來.definition: to come; (used as a substitute for a more specific verb); hither (directional complement for motion toward the speaker, as in 回來|回来[hui2lai5]); ever since (as in 自古以來|自古以来[zi4gu3 yi3lai2]); for the past (amount of time); (prefix) the coming ...; the next ... (as in 來世|来世[lai2shi4]); (between two verbs) in order to; (after a round number) approximately; (used after 得[de2] to indicate possibility, as in 談得來|谈得来[tan2de5lai2], or after 不[bu4] to indicate impossibility, as in 吃不來|吃不来[chi1bu5lai2])

來不及.definition: there's not enough time (to do sth); it's too late (to do sth)

來不得.definition: cannot allow (to be present); cannot admit

來信.definition: incoming letter; to send us a letter

來函.definition: incoming letter; letter from afar; same as 來信|来信[lai2 xin4]

來勁.definition: (dialect) to be full of zeal; high-spirited; exhilarating; to stir sb up

來去無蹤.definition: come without a shadow, leave without a footprint (idiom); to come and leave without a trace

來回.definition: to make a round trip; return journey; back and forth; to and fro; repeatedly

來回來去.definition: repeatedly; back and forth again and again

來安.definition: Lai'an, a county in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2zhou1], Anhui

來安縣.definition: Lai'an, a county in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2zhou1], Anhui

來往.definition: to come and go; to have dealings with; to be in relation with

來得.definition: to emerge (from a comparison); to come out as; to be competent or equal to

來得及.definition: to have enough time; can do it in time; can still make it

來得早不如來得巧.pinyin: lai2 de5 zao3 bu4 ru2 lai2 de5 qiao3
來得早不如來得巧.definition: arriving early can't beat coming at the right time; perfect timing

來復槍.definition: rifle (loanword); also written 來福槍|来福枪

來復線.definition: rifling (spiral lines on inside of gun barrel imparting spin to the bullet)

來日.definition: future days; (literary) the next day; (old) past days

來日方長.definition: the future is long (idiom); there will be ample time for that later; We'll cross that bridge when we get there

來歷不明.definition: (idiom) of unknown origin; of dubious background

來潮.definition: (of water) to rise; rising tide; (of women) to get one's period

來無影，去無蹤.pinyin: lai2 wu2 ying3 , qu4 wu2 zong1
來無影，去無蹤.definition: lit. come without a shadow, leave without a footprint (idiom); to come and go without a trace

來犯.definition: (of enemy forces) to invade; to attack

來硬的.definition: to get tough; to use force

來福槍.definition: rifle (loanword); also written 來復槍|来复枪

來福線.definition: rifling (helical grooves inside the barrel of a gun)

來義.definition: Laiyi township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

來義鄉.definition: Laii township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

來者不善，善者不來.pinyin: lai2 zhe3 bu4 shan4 , shan4 zhe3 bu4 lai2
來者不善，善者不來.definition: He who comes is surely ill-intentioned, no-one well-meaning will come (idiom).; Be careful not to trust foreigners.; Beware of Greeks bearing gifts!

來者不拒.definition: to refuse nobody (idiom); all comers welcome

來而不往非禮也.pinyin: lai2 er2 bu4 wang3 fei1 li3 ye3
來而不往非禮也.definition: not to reciprocate is against etiquette (classical); to respond in kind

來自.definition: to come from (a place); From: (in email header)

來著.definition: auxiliary showing sth happened in the past

來襲.definition: to invade; (of a storm etc) to strike; to hit

來賓市.definition: Laibin, prefecture-level city in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3xi1 Zhuang4zu2 Zi4zhi4qu1]

來路不明.definition: unidentified origin; no-one knows where it comes from; of dubious background

來蹤去跡.definition: the traces of a person's movements; (fig.) sb's history; (fig.) the ins and out of a matter

來電.definition: incoming telephone call (or telegram); to phone in; to send in a telegram; to have an instant attraction to sb; (of electricity, after an outage) to come back

來電答鈴.definition: (Tw) ringback tone (heard by the originator of a telephone call)

來鳳.definition: Laifeng County in Enshi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1 shi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Hubei

來鳳縣.definition: Laifeng County in Enshi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1 shi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Hubei

來鴻去燕.definition: lit. the goose comes, the swallow goes (idiom); fig. always on the move

來龍去脈.definition: lit. the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom); fig. the whole sequence of events; causes and effects
